input.system_prompt:
You are an AI assistant evaluating product relevancy.
Your goal is to determine how relevant a list of competitor products are to a specific reference product, based on names and descriptions.
Output the scores as a JSON object containing a single key 'scores', which is an array of objects. Each object in the array must have 'competitor_product_name' (the exact competitor product name provided in the input), 'relevancy_score' (an integer 1-10), and 'rationale' (a brief explanation for the score).

The relevancy scale is 1-10:
- 1: Not relevant at all.
- 10: Identical product.

Important scoring guidelines:
- Focus on product function, features, silhouette, and construction
- DO NOT emphasize color or pattern when scoring, as the reference product may encompass a wide range of colors/patterns not specified
- Consider the core product type, shape, materials, and intended use
- Evaluate if the products serve similar purposes and would appeal to similar customers
- Ensure every competitor product listed receives a score.
input.user_prompt:
Reference Brand: "Taylor Stitch"
Reference Product Name: "The Democratic Chino"
Reference Product Description:
Originally issued to American soldiers during WWII, the first military chinos were celebrated for their comfort, versatility, and impressive ruggedness. They proved so popular, in fact, that soldiers held onto their well-worn pairs even after discharge, and as more and more civilians took notice, the style became a fixture of garages and workshops as well as college campuses and city streets all across the country. Featuring 100% Responsible materials and an updated silhouette, The Foundation Pant is both a reinvention of our earlier chinos and an elevated reimagining of the all-purpose originals, built to help you start your day on solid ground. Because it's been garment dyed and washed, it has the character of a well-loved vintage piece, and it'll continue to pick up a ton of nuance with wear. Cool herringbone accents at the waistband and the pockets serve as a nod to the style's military origins. SPECIFICATIONS Classic medium rise, tailored fit, straight through the thigh with a slight taper from knee to leg opening. Available in 32" inseam. 8-oz. 100% organic cotton. 5-oz. 100% organic cotton herringbone pocketing. Garment dyed and washed for a vintage feel. Front slash pockets allow easy entry into pockets. Low-profile welt coin pocket inset at waistband. Two back welt pockets. 4-hole vintage military style button at waistband. YKK zipper fly. Bound fly and outseam. Wash cold and tumble dry low. Made in China. Model is 6'1", wearing a 32.

Competitor Products to Evaluate (Max 25):
  - Name='Kinetic Men's Pull-On Jogger Pants'
  - Name='Club Monaco Men's Solid Modern Slim-fit Conner Chino Pant'
  - Name='Everlane Men's Slim Fit Chinos'
  - Name='Everlane Men's Performance Traveler Chino'
  - Name='Dockers Men's Classic Fit Essential Chinos'
  - Name='Dockers Men's Straight Fit Ultimate Chinos with Smart 360 Flex'
  - Name='Lululemon Men's ABC Classic-Fit 5 Pocket Pants in Utilitech'
  - Name='Lululemon Men's ABC Classic-Fit 32L Utilitech Pants'
  - Name='Lululemon Men's ABC Classic-Fit Trousers in Warpstreme'
  - Name='Lululemon Men's ABC Slim-Fit Wovenair Trousers'
  - Name='Lululemon Men's ABC Classic-Fit Trousers in 30L Smooth Twill'
  - Name='Taylor Stitch Slim Foundation Pant'
  - Name='Taylor Stitch Men's Organic Cotton Democratic Foundation Pants'
  - Name='Everlane Men's Transit Chino'
  - Name='Men's Taylor Stitch Democratic Foundation Pant'
  - Name='Taylor Stitch The Wharf Pant'
  - Name='Everlane Women's Linen Easy Pant'
  - Name='Man Dockers Ultimate 360 Slim Pants'

Based on the reference product description and each competitor product's name, please provide the relevancy score for *each* competitor product using the 1-10 scale. Remember to focus on product features, silhouette, and construction rather than color or pattern. Return the results in the specified JSON format (an object with a 'scores' array, where each item has 'competitor_product_name', 'relevancy_score', and 'rationale' explaining why you assigned that score).

scores.description: An array of relevancy scores for the competitor products.

competitor_product_name.description: The exact name of the competitor product as provided in the input.

rationale.description: Brief explanation for why this score was assigned.

scores_with_rationales.rationale: Jogger pants differ notably in silhouette and construction from chinos; pull-on style with elastic features contrasts with the tailored fit and classic button/zip fly of the reference chinos.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Club Monaco Men's Solid Modern Slim-fit Conner Chino Pant
scores_with_rationales.rationale: This product is a slim-fit chino pant, similar in purpose and construction to the reference; modern fit likely aligns closely with tailored fit though may differ slightly in fabric or embellishments.
Slim fit chinos share core characteristics with the reference productâ€”chino fabric, tailored/slim silhouette, likely similar classic styling.

Also a chino pant with tailored fit, but 'performance traveler' suggests stretch/performance fabric, possibly differing in materials and intended use slightly from vintage-inspired organic cotton chinos.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Dockers Men's Classic Fit Essential Chinos
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Classic fit chinos serve a similar purpose and style but may be less tailored than the reference's 'tailored fit,' and likely differ in construction and fabric qualities.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Dockers Men's Straight Fit Ultimate Chinos with Smart 360 Flex
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Straight fit chinos with stretch fabric represent a similar category; smart stretch and fit features may replace some vintage ruggedness feel but overall similar product type.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Lululemon Men's ABC Classic-Fit 5 Pocket Pants in Utilitech
scores_with_rationales.rationale: These pants are classic fit and have 5 pockets like chinos, but Lululemon's ABC pants are performance-oriented with technical fabric, differing from traditional organic cotton chino construction.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Lululemon Men's ABC Classic-Fit 32L Utilitech Pants
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Same as above; classic fit chino-style pants but differ in material (technical fabric) and construction from the vintage-inspired organic cotton chinos.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Lululemon Men's ABC Classic-Fit Trousers in Warpstreme
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Trousers in technical fabric Warpstreme differ more in intended use and construction; less chino-like and more technical dress pant inspired.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Lululemon Men's ABC Slim-Fit Wovenair Trousers
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Slim-fit trousers with performance fabric diverge from the classic organic cotton chinos in construction and fabric focus, thus less relevant.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Lululemon Men's ABC Classic-Fit Trousers in 30L Smooth Twill
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Classic-fit trousers in twill fabric resemble chinos somewhat, but are performance and technical in nature, differing from the vintage military organic cotton chinos.
A Taylor Stitch pant closely related to the Foundation Pant, only differing likely in fit as slim; very relevant given shared brand, construction, and intended style.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Taylor Stitch Men's Organic Cotton Democratic Foundation Pants
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Essentially the same product as the reference (The Democratic Chino), made with organic cotton and named Democratic Foundation Pants; identical in silhouette and construction.
Transit chino likely a tailored or slim chino with performance fabric; similar function but some difference in fabric and focus compared to vintage organic cotton chinos.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Men's Taylor Stitch Democratic Foundation Pant
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Same product as the reference, exact name and brand match confirm identical silhouette, construction and materials.
Different model of pants by Taylor Stitch; likely similar quality and construction but possibly diverges in silhouette or materials from the Democratic Chino style.
Womenâ€™s linen easy pant differs substantially in fabric (linen) and likely silhouette (easy fit) versus tailored organic cotton chinos for men.
Slim pants from Dockers with stretch (360 flex) are similar in silhouette and function to chinos but fabric stretch and styling may diverge from vintage organic cotton chinos.
